name: Loop Kingdom
description:
Loop Kingdom is a game focused on selling veteran fighters and hiring new ones.... while improving your market and keep searching for that legendary fighter that will take you to floor 200 or 400....

THIS GAME IS PLAYED WHILE BEING AFK => IDLE GAMES.

If you dont like idlers .. there is no need to be here.. if you wanna give it a chance , you will honor me =D!

FEATURES

  • A market where you can always hire new and best fighters...
  • A charming endless arena... =)
  • Animated Fighters.
  • Sell veteran fighters
  • Improve your market and hire better mercs!
  • Pixel hand drawn graphics!
  • A charming blueish and coolish atmosphere...
